title: Why is the lightbar Google Assistant gone?
content:
Hi there, when I got my Pixel 4a, my assistant wasn't full screen and had a cool looking lightbar. Now, suddenly a while after I got my phone, the lightbar is now gone and I have the full screen Google assistant. How come this happened? Can you please bring it back? Thanks in advance

First picture: what I have now
